text: Celtic Frost was a thrash/black metal band from Zurich, Switzerland. The band was formed in 1984 and broke up in 1993. The reunited in 2001 and broke up again in 2008. == Discography == Celtic Frost released 6 studio albums: ===Albums=== *Morbid Tales (1984) *To Mega Therion (1985) *Into the Pandemonium (1987) *Cold Lake (1988) *Vanity/Nemesis (1990) *Monotheist (2006) ==References== == Other websites == * Official website Category:Thrash metal bands Category:Death metal bands Category:Swiss heavy metal bands Category:Organizations based in ZÃ¼rich Category:Musical groups established in 1984 Category:1984 establishments in Europe Category:1980s establishments in Switzerland Category:Musical groups disestablished in 1993 Category:Musical groups established in 2001 Category:2001 establishments in Europe Category:2000s establishments in Switzerland Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2008 Category:2008 disestablishments in Switzerland
title: Celtic Frost
